actions.name: action_top_coins
actions.description: Search top N coins ordered by Market Cap. page_number starts from 1, default: 1. page_limit is the number of coins per page, default: 100.

actions.name: action_list_categories
actions.description: Query all the coins categories with market data (market cap, volume, etc.) on CoinGecko which are sorted by the market cap.

actions.name: action_trusted_tokens_by_network
actions.description: Get all trusted tokens by network. Supported networks are: all, ethereum, optimism, polygon, base, arbitrum, gnosis and zksync

actions.name: action_search_token_by_name
actions.description: Search for a token by name

actions.name: action_trending
actions.description: Query trending search coins, nfts and categories on CoinGecko in the last 24 hours. It supports: Top 15 trending coins (sorted by the most popular user searches), Top 7 trending NFTs (sorted by the highest percentage change in floor prices) and Top 5 trending categories (sorted by the most popular user searches)

actions.name: action_coins_by_category
actions.description: Search coins by category. page_number starts from 1, default: 1. page_limit is the number of coins per page, default: 100.
